(Re-)Install VMWARE Tools

  1. On VMWare VMs, Install VMWare tools
    cd /var/tmp
wget http://pablsv02/drivers/VMwareTools-10.0.6-3560309.tar
    tar xf /var/tmp/VMwareTools-10.0.6-3560309.tar
cd vmware-tools-distrib
sudo ./vmware-install.pl --default

    Cleanup 

    sudo rm -rf /var/tmp/vmware-tools-distrib /var/tmp/VMwareTools-10.0.6-3560309.tar
